agentContext.summary: A Farcaster miniapp using React + Vite frontend, Hono API on Cloudflare Workers, with D1 SQLite database.
agentContext.full_text:
## Project Structure

- `src/App.tsx` - React application entry point
- `src/worker.ts` - Hono API routes for backend
- `src/components/` - React components
- `schema.sql` - D1 database schema
- `wrangler.jsonc` - Cloudflare Workers configuration

## Conventions

- API routes are defined with Hono in `src/worker.ts`
- Frontend uses Vite for bundling and is served as static assets
- Database uses D1 prepared statements for queries
- Secrets are managed via jack and pushed to Cloudflare
- Wrangler is installed globally by jack, not in project dependencies

## Resources

- [Farcaster Miniapp Docs](https://miniapps.farcaster.xyz)
- [Hono Documentation](https://hono.dev)
- [Cloudflare D1 Docs](https://developers.cloudflare.com/d1)
